 2022-03472022-04-06,  ,  GAC,  ,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to Accept, on Behalf of Canada, Annex VII of the Rotterdam Convention on the Prior Informed Consent Procedure for Certain Hazardous Chemicals and Pesticides in International Trade
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to accept, on behalf of Canada, ANNEX VII OF THE ROTTERDAM CONVENTION ON THE PRIOR INFORMED CONSENT PROCEDURE FOR CERTAIN HAZARDOUS CHEMICALS AND PESTICIDES IN INTERNATIONAL TRADE, adopted at Geneva on May 8, 2019.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to Accept, on Behalf of Canada, Annex VII of the Rotterdam Convention on the Prior Informed Consent Procedure for Certain Hazardous Chemicals and Pesticides in International Trade
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary to accept, on behalf of Canada, ANNEX VII OF THE ROTTERDAM CONVENTION ON THE PRIOR INFORMED CONSENT PROCEDURE FOR CERTAIN HAZARDOUS CHEMICALS AND PESTICIDES IN INTERNATIONAL TRADE, adopted at Geneva on May 8, 2019.
